ValidationRule.description: If Internet Search, or Other: fill in the blank option, collect more info.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISBLANK(Description), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Initial_Found_Helpline_Via__c,"Internet Search (Google, Yahoo, etc.)"), ISPICKVAL(Initial_Found_Helpline_Via__c,"Other: fill in the blank option") ), !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "case" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please be sure to add details in the Description field about the website or other source from which you found out about Komen.
